oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1956-11-24 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 1 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from November 24, 1956. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Faron Young (host/performer), guest performers the Louvin Brothers, and regular performers Rod Brasfield, Chet Atkins, Minnie Pearl, and Del Wood. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Faron Young; Rod Brasfield; Louvin Brothers; Chet Atkins; Minnie Pearl
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Grant Turner introduces Faron Young -- Turn Her Down (Faron Young) -- Opening statement (Grant Turner, Faron Young) -- Faron Young introduces Rod Brasfield -- Comedy routine (Rod Brasfield, Faron Young) -- Prince Albert commercial (Grant Turner, Faron Young) -- Faron Young introduces the Louvin Brothers -- Cash On The Barrelhead (Louvin Brothers) -- Faron Young talks -- In The Garden (Faron Young, Louvin Brothers) -- Prince Albert commercial (Grant Turner, Faron Young) -- Prince Albert jingle -- Faron Young introduces Chet Atkins -- [Unidentified guitar instrumental] (Chet Atkins) -- Faron Young introduces Minnie Pearl -- Comedy routine (Minnie Pearl) [continued in part 2]
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); Turner, Grant; Brasfield, Rod; Minnie Pearl; Atkins, Chet; Wood, Del; Young, Faron; Louvin Brothers; Louvin, Ira, 1924-1965; Louvin, Charlie, 1927-2011
